Evansville.Metro Sports Center:
The Metro Sports Center is a multi-purpose center in Evansville, Indiana, USA. The facility has two indoor fields, one field at 180' x 80' and a smaller field at 81' x 51'. It has 4 baseball cage/pitching areas for use.


== Professional teams ==
The facility is currently home to the Evansville Crush semi-professional soccer team of the Premier Arena Soccer League.
